languageKey.label: Tag Pack selections
Tag Pack selections provide a list of primary keys from one or more tables, from records corresponding to selected tags.
Tag Pack selections act as a secondary provider in a Tesseract structure.
Name
Some significant name or label for the selection.
List of tables
Select which tables to get the records from.
Tags selector
Simply select some tags from the available ones to form a selection. Overrides tag selection from expressions (below).
Tags from expressions
Use expressions to select tags instead of the above selector.

Enter an expression on each line to select tags. Expressions are of the form:
key: value
Refer to the Expressions manual for more details about using expressions. Lines can be commented out with "#" or "//".
Selection by expression will be overridden by manual selections made in the "Tags" field.
When this box is checked, the tags fecthed using expressions will override the manually selected ones. Otherwise tags from both sources are merged.
Logical operator
Choose "AND" to find items that match ALL tags. Choose "OR" (default) to find items that match any one tag.

Be warned that choosing the "AND" operator requires additional processing. This is due to the fact that the condition cannot be resolved in a singe database query. Instead some post-processing is needed, to find items that match all selected tags.
